text: Wanfang Community is a metro station on the Wenhu Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code of this station is BR03. == Station layout information == The platforms are above ground level. Platform 1 is for Taipei Nangang Exhibition Center and Platform 2 is for Taipei Zoo. == Around the station == *Wanfang Community *Wanfang Elementary School *Yuanye Sports Park Category:Taipei Metro
title: Wanfang Community metro station
